mapper.sql: id as id , years as years , sort as sort , m_beikaochongci_type_id as mbeikaochongciTypeId , m_beikaochongci_type as mbeikaochongciType , subjectId as subjectId , paperName as paperName , frontCover as frontCover , subContent as subContent , price as price , isAccept as isAccept , resources as resources , resourcesExt as resourcesExt , resourcesFilesize as resourcesFilesize , downloadsAutomatic as downloadsAutomatic , downloadsManual as downloadsManual , createDate as createDate , status as status , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , areaId as areaId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_examination_paper ( years, sort, m_beikaochongci_type_id, m_beikaochongci_type, subjectId, paperName, frontCover, subContent, price, isAccept, resources, resourcesExt, resourcesFilesize, downloadsAutomatic, downloadsManual, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, areaId ) VALUES ( #{years}, #{sort}, #{mbeikaochongciTypeId}, #{mbeikaochongciType}, #{subjectId}, #{paperName}, #{frontCover}, #{subContent}, #{price}, #{isAccept}, #{resources}, #{resourcesExt}, #{resourcesFilesize}, #{downloadsAutomatic}, #{downloadsManual}, #{createDate}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{areaId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_examination_paper
years = #{years},
sort = #{sort},
m_beikaochongci_type_id = #{mbeikaochongciTypeId},
m_beikaochongci_type = #{mbeikaochongciType},
subjectId = #{subjectId},
paperName = #{paperName},
frontCover = #{frontCover},
subContent = #{subContent},
price = #{price},
isAccept = #{isAccept},
resources = #{resources},
resourcesExt = #{resourcesExt},
resourcesFilesize = #{resourcesFilesize},
downloadsAutomatic = #{downloadsAutomatic},
downloadsManual = #{downloadsManual},
createDate = #{createDate},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
areaId in (#{areaId},'0')
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_examination_paper
years = #{map.years},
sort = #{map.sort},
m_beikaochongci_type_id = #{map.mbeikaochongciTypeId},
m_beikaochongci_type = #{map.mbeikaochongciType},
subjectId = #{map.subjectId},
paperName = #{map.paperName},
frontCover = #{map.frontCover},
subContent = #{map.subContent},
price = #{map.price},
isAccept = #{map.isAccept},
resources = #{map.resources},
resourcesExt = #{map.resourcesExt},
resourcesFilesize = #{map.resourcesFilesize},
downloadsAutomatic = #{map.downloadsAutomatic},
downloadsManual = #{map.downloadsManual},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
areaId = #{map.areaId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_examination_paper ( years, sort, m_beikaochongci_type_id, m_beikaochongci_type, subjectId, paperName, frontCover, subContent, price, isAccept, resources, resourcesExt, resourcesFilesize, downloadsAutomatic, downloadsManual, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, areaId ) VALUES ( #{map.years}, #{map.sort}, #{map.mbeikaochongciTypeId}, #{map.mbeikaochongciType}, #{map.subjectId}, #{map.paperName}, #{map.frontCover}, #{map.subContent}, #{map.price}, #{map.isAccept}, #{map.resources}, #{map.resourcesExt}, #{map.resourcesFilesize}, #{map.downloadsAutomatic}, #{map.downloadsManual}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.areaId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_examination_paper
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND years like CONCAT('%', #{condition.years} , '%')
AND sort like CONCAT('%', #{condition.sort} , '%')
AND m_beikaochongci_type_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.mbeikaochongciTypeId} , '%')
AND m_beikaochongci_type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.mbeikaochongciType} , '%')
AND subjectId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.subjectId} , '%')
AND paperName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.paperName} , '%')
AND frontCover like CONCAT('%', #{condition.frontCover} , '%')
AND subContent like CONCAT('%', #{condition.subContent} , '%')
AND price like CONCAT('%', #{condition.price} , '%')
AND isAccept like CONCAT('%', #{condition.isAccept} , '%')
AND resources like CONCAT('%', #{condition.resources} , '%')
AND resourcesExt like CONCAT('%', #{condition.resourcesExt} , '%')
AND resourcesFilesize like CONCAT('%', #{condition.resourcesFilesize} , '%')
AND downloadsAutomatic like CONCAT('%', #{condition.downloadsAutomatic} , '%')
AND downloadsManual like CONCAT('%', #{condition.downloadsManual} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND areaId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.areaId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
